officialTitle: Using Magnetic Resonance Techniques to Improve the Characterisation and Localisation of Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Sensitivity of MR techniques in detecting histopathologically-identified multifocal and multicentric lesions
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Biopsy proven invasive ductal carcinoma of the breast
* Unifocal disease
* Patient proceeding to mastectomy

Exclusion Criteria:

* Multifocal disease
* Previous surgery to ipsilateral breast
* Neoadjuvant chemotherapy
* Ferromagnetic implants
* Claustrophobia
* Cup size DD or greater
